definition: lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: FLATOW: And what kind of damage do these stink bugs do?
A female stinkbug lays 300 to 400 eggs at a time, and dies after the eggs are laid.
sentences.chinese: 一只雌蠋蝽每次产卵三百至四百粒，产后便死去。

sentences.english: The potential of the main 3 species for biological control of Thrips palmiis is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 中华微刺盲蝽是防治节瓜蓟马前景最大的天敌之一。

sentences.english: The pesticides stated above can be used for cont-rolling D. baccarum in large area.
sentences.chinese: 以上药剂均可在大面积防治细毛蝽时推广使用。

sentences.english: This paper deas with studies of comparison of reproductive capacity of Microvelia horvathi adults with different wing forms.
sentences.chinese: 本文比较研究了尖钩宽黾蝽不同翅型成虫的生殖力。

sentences.english: The stinkbug has a special weapon for self-defense.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的自卫武器还使蠋蝽免遭鸟类的荼毒。

sentences.english: The insect called the water boatman is two millimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 它就是身长只有两毫米的划蝽。

sentences.english: Dr Ohba has also photographed giant water bugs eating snakes in the past.
sentences.chinese: 大庭博士过去还拍到了过巨型水蝽进食蛇类的照片。

sentences.english: Glutamic dehydrogenase was found to be present in the fat bodies of Tryporyza incertulas Walker and Tessaratoma papittosa Drury.
sentences.chinese: 在三化螟与荔枝蝽脂肪体中均存在谷氨酸脱氢酶。

sentences.english: This stink bug from Singapore looks like it's carrying a gorilla-mask on its back.
sentences.chinese: 产自新加坡的蝽，背面像大猩猩，污棉虫家族的成员。

sentences.english: Per square meter with 1 g of aluminum phosphide , the bugs have a stronger root toxicity.
sentences.chinese: 每平方米用磷化铝1克，对根蝽有较强的毒杀作用。

sentences.english: I grabbed my camera and a flashlight and snapped this shot of an assassin bug nymph.
sentences.chinese: 我抓起我的相机和闪光灯迅速的拍下了一只猎蝽若虫。

definition: Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)
looper caterpillar, larva of moth in family Geometridae/inch worm
Orthoptera (insect order including grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
